title: Unitary Cooling Air-Conditioning Equipment
description: Schema for ASHRAE 205 annex RS0002: Unitary Cooling Air-Conditioning Equipment

model_number.note: Pattern shall match all model numbers that can be represented by the representation

manufacturer_data_source_version.description: Version of the software used to generate the AHRI rating and the performance maps

SEER.description: Seasonal Energy Efficiency Ratio as defined by AHRI 210/240

EER.description: Energy Efficiency Ratio (A) as defined by AHRI 210/240
EER.notes: The net efficiency (accounting for fan motor heat/power) at the AHRI 'A' operating conditions

capacity.description: Total cooling capacity (A) as defined by AHRI 210/240
capacity.notes: The net capacity (accounting for fan motor heat) at the AHRI 'A' operating conditions

rating_fan_power_per_flow.description: Power per air flow rate of the fan used in the AHRI 210/240 calculation of SEER and EER
rating_fan_power_per_flow.notes: Used for verification of the rated SEER value (see SEER calculation procedures in AHRI 210/240)

rating_reproducible_from_performance_dat.description: Whether this rating can be reproduced using the performance data in the representation
rating_reproducible_from_performance_dat.notes: Mark this field as yes if the rating values in this table can be reproduced using the performance data in the representation within the tolerance of the rating standard.

manufacturer_data_source_version.description: Version of the software used to generate the AHRI rating and the performance maps

IEER.description: Integrated Energy Efficiency Ratio as defined by AHRI 340/360

EER.description: Energy Efficiency Ratio as defined by AHRI 340/360
EER.notes: Net efficiency accounts for fan motor heat/power

capacity.description: Total cooling capacity as defined by AHRI 340/360
capacity.notes: Net capacity accounts for fan motor heat

rating_fan_power_per_flow.description: Power per air flow rate of the indoor fan used in the AHRI 340/360 calculation of IEER and EER
rating_fan_power_per_flow.notes: Used for verification of the rated SEER value (see SEER calculation procedures in AHRI 340/360)

rating_reproducible_from_performance_dat.description: Whether this rating can be reproduced using the performance data in the representation
rating_reproducible_from_performance_dat.notes: Mark this field as yes if the rating values in this table can be reproduced using the performance data in the representation within the tolerance of the rating standard.
